St._Charles.West Lake Landfill:
West Lake Landfill is a closed, unlined mixed-waste landfill located in Bridgeton, Missouri. Its contents have been shown to include radioactive waste; it is thus also an EPA Superfund cleanup site.


== History ==

The West Lake Landfill site originated in 1939 as a limestone quarry operated by the Westlake Quarry Company.
